abstract: Comcast and Time Warner move forward with their vision of “TV Everywhere,” signing a new contract that covers the online streaming of channels like TNT, TBS, CNN, and the Cartoon Network.
snippet: Comcast and Time Warner move forward with their vision of “TV Everywhere,” signing a new contract that covers the online streaming of channels like TNT, TBS, CNN, and the Cartoon Network.
lead_paragraph: In a first-of-its-kind deal, Comcast and Time Warner have signed a new contract that covers the online streaming of channels like TNT, TBS, CNN, and the Cartoon Network.

headline.main: Comcast and Time Warner Sign Online Streaming Deal
